content:
Here is an example of an ABC music file:
```
X:1
T:My Song
M:4/4
L:1/4
K:G
|:D2|G2B2 d2g2|B2d2 g2b2|d2g2 B2d2|g2b2 d3B|
G2B2 d2g2|B2d2 g2b2|d2g2 B2d2|g2b2 d3g|
d2g2 b2d2|g2b2 d2g2|B2d2 g2b2|d2g2 B2d2|
g2b2 d3:|
```
This file describes a song called "My Song" in the key of G with a 4/4 time signature. It includes a simple melody with chords indicated by the letters in the music. The vertical lines (|) indicate measures, and the colons (:) indicate repeats.
